thread.title: Cord-Cutting Pain Is Spread Unevenly -- Overheard

author: wsjcom
title: Cord-Cutting Pain Is Spread Unevenly -- Overheard
text:
Cord-cutting is officially the U.S. media industry’s fear du jour. But not all companies will fare the same if subscriber declines accelerate.
Analysts at Sanford C. Bernstein set out to show how sensitive major media companies are to a drop in the affiliate fees they charge pay-TV providers per subscriber.
Despite the negative reaction to its earnings report earlier this month, Walt Disney isn’t the most exposed. That honor... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
